short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moo.do brings your Tasks, Email, and Calendar together so you can focus on getting things done.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension augments your Gmail to save emails into Moo.do, and adds a toolbar button to save the current page to Moo.do.
